# SQLite Example

First, you have to install SQLite dependency

```{r}
if (!require("RSQLite")) install.packages("RSQLite")
```


```{r}
library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname="tajetasblack.db")

```

And finally, you can query the database ...

```{sql connection=con}

SELECT id_consejero
FROM consejero
LIMIT 10
```
